UniprotID	P40227-2
Accession	P40227;A6NCD2;Q3KP28;Q75LP4;Q96S46
EntryName	TCPZ_HUMAN
ProteinName	T-complex protein 1 subunit zeta (TCP-1-zeta) (Acute morphine dependence-related protein 2) (CCT-zeta-1) (Chaperonin containing T-complex polypeptide 1 subunit 6A) (HTR3) (Tcp20)
GeneName	CCT6A CCT6 CCTZ
Length	486
Function	Component of the chaperonin-containing T-complex (TRiC), a molecular chaperone complex that assists the folding of proteins upon ATP hydrolysis (PubMed:25467444). The TRiC complex mediates the folding of WRAP53/TCAB1, thereby regulating telomere maintenance (PubMed:25467444). The TRiC complex plays a role in the folding of actin and tubulin (Probable).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure	
Hydropathy
